description: A "significant number" of official bodies do not publish sufficient information, watchdog says.
title: 'Inconsistent' financial reporting by States of Jersey
title_page: 'Inconsistent' financial reporting by States of Jersey - BBC News
maintext: Comptroller Pamment said the government needed to ensure there was a "consistent set of minimum requirements" for entities set up by the States Assembly, including information regarding performance and accountability as well as disclosure of financial information.
